name: Apple Macbook Air M1, 8GB
description: My goto tool for development, design, and everything in between.

name: iPhone 11
description: The device I rely on for communication, entertainment, and everything in between.

name: Kindle Paperwhite, Gen 10
description: Read Read Read. I love reading books and Kindle is my goto device for that.

name: Apple Airpods Pro
description: Music, Podcasts, Business calls, and everything else

name: LG 29" Ultrawide Monitor - 29WL500-B
description: The monitor I fell in love with, the wide angle setup helps me to focus on multiple things at once.

name: Cursor
description: Cursor is a code editor that is designed to be more efficient and productive.

name: Obsidian
description: Obsidian is a powerful knowledge base that works on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files.

name: Postman
description: Postman is a user-friendly API testing and development platform that simplifies the process of building and testing APIs.

name: iTerm2
description: A terminal emulator for macOS that provides advanced features such as split panes, search, autocomplete, and mouse support.

name: TablePlus
description: A modern, native, and powerful GUI tool for managing relational databases, with support for a wide range of databases and advanced features such as SSH tunneling, SSL encryption, and query profiling.

name: Google Chrome
description: A fast, secure, and user-friendly web browser that supports a wide range of extensions and features such as tab management, autofill, and bookmarks.

name: Raycast
description: A productivity app for macOS that provides quick access to your favorite tools and commands, with support for integrations such as Jira, GitHub, and Google Drive.

name: Logi Options+
description: A powerful app that allows you to customize and optimize the settings of your Logitech devices, with support for features such as gesture control, cursor speed, and button mapping.

name: Telegram
description: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging app that allows users to send text messages, voice messages, and files of any type (documents, photos, videos, etc.) to other users.

name: Discord
description: Discord is a popular communication app designed for gamers that allows users to join voice and text chat channels and connect with other players.

name: Slack
description: Slack is a popular communication app that allows users to send messages, make calls, and share files.

name: Zoom
description: Zoom is a video conferencing app that allows users to host and join virtual meetings, webinars, and online events.

name: Iruve
description: Iruve is a screen color temperature management tool that allows users to adjust the color temperature of their display to reduce eye strain and improve sleep quality.

name: DaVinci Resolve
description: DaVinci Resolve is a professional video editing software that includes advanced color correction tools, visual effects, and audio post-production capabilities.

name: IINA
description: IINA is a free, open-source multimedia player for macOS that supports a wide range of video and audio formats and includes features such as customizable playback speed and subtitle support.

name: Handbrake
description: Handbrake is a free, open-source video transcoding software that allows users to convert video files from one format to another and adjust video quality settings.

name: Blender
description: Blender is a free, open-source 3D creation suite that includes features such as modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, and motion tracking.

name: Plex
description: Plex is a media server software that allows users to stream and manage their media content across multiple devices.

name: Immich
description: Immich is a self-hosted photo and video backup solution that allows users to store and manage their media content in a private and secure environment.
